original_text: So Asa took all the silver and gold that they had stored in his palace and in the Lord's temple. He gave it to his servants. He told them to take it to Ben-Hadad, king of Syria, who lived in Damascus. Ben-Hadad's father was Tabrimmon and his grandfather was Hezion.
korean_text: 아사가 여호와의 성전 곳간과 왕궁 곳간에 남은 은금을 모두 가져다가 그 신하의 손에 넘겨 다메섹에 거주하고 있는 아람의 왕 헤시온의 손자 다브림몬의 아들 벤하닷에게 보내며 이르되

sentences.original_text: So Asa took all the silver and gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 아사는 모든 은과 금을 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: that they had stored in his palace
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그의 궁에 저장해 둔 것을

sentences.original_text: He gave it to his servants.
He told them to take it
